casebody.data:
Charles P. DANIELS, Jr., and Linda M. Daniels, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 2007-5151. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 10, 2008. Catherine M. Brown, Catherine M. Brown, LLC, of Morristown, New Jersey, argued for plaintiffs-appellants. Kathleen E. Lyon, Attorney, Tax Division, United States Department of Justice, of Washington, DC, argued for defendantappellee. With her on the brief were Richard T. Morrison, Acting Assistant Attorney General, and Robert W. Metzler, Attorney.

Before RADER, Circuit Judge, CLEVENGER, Senior Circuit Judge and MOORE, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
